Chapter Eleven [Luca]40-luca “ Did [[your]0-i grandmother]2210-your grandmother specify why [she]2210-your grandmother demanded [my]135-my grandmother attendance tonight ? ”[135-my grandmother] [Valentina]40-luca asks as [she]135-my grandmother steps into [the car]465-the car . Chapter Fourteen [Valentina]40-luca [I]0-i pause outside of [[Abuela]37-abuela ’s [home]221-home]549-abuela ’s home and stare up at [it]221-home , feeling lost . Chapter Eighteen [Valentina]40-luca “ [I]63-theo did n’t think [you]0-i ’d ever say yes , ”[63-theo] [Theo]63-theo says , snapping [me]0-i out of [my]0-i thoughts . What ’s wrong with [me]0-i ? Chapter Twenty - Four [Valentina Luca]40-luca stares at [me]0-i for a moment , a vicious glint in [his]40-luca eyes . Chapter Forty - Eight [Valentina]40-luca [I]0-i sit in bed with [my]0-i laptop and scroll through the news articles covering the rapid demise of [[my]0-i father]144-my father ’s company .
